name: MPE Support
description: MIDI Polyphonic Expression (MPE) support for enhanced expressive control. Handles note allocation and per-note pitch bend. Supports both standard (common channel 1) and upper zone (common channel 16) configurations.

parameters.name: MIDI channel
parameters.description: MPE common channel. Typically 1 for standard zone, 16 for upper zone.

parameters.name: MPE channels
parameters.description: Number of MPE note channels. For common channel 1, uses channels 2-N. For common channel 16, uses channels 15 down to minimum.
